features: Yardley London soap bath bar bundle - 10 items: cocoa butter, oatmeal & almond, English lavender, aloe & avocado 4.25 oz bars (pack of 10 bars, two of each)
2 bar English lavender with pure lavender extracts and essential oils - calms and soothes
2 bar oatmeal & almond with natural oatmeal to soothe dry skin - gently exfoliates
2 bar lemon verbena with natural shea butter and pure citrus oils - softens and tones
2 bar of pure cocoa shea butter & vitamin e, 4.25 ounces /120 g and 2 bar of aloe & avocado, 4.25 ounces /120 g
body.description: Yardley London Soap Bath Bar Bundle - 10 Items: English Lavender, Oatmeal and Almond, Aloe and Avocado, Cocoa Butter, Lemon Verbena 4.25 Oz Bars.(Pack of 10 Bars, Two of each)2 Bar English Lavender with pure Lavender extracts and essential oils - calms and soothes Gently exfoliates.Romance Your Skin with English Lavender. The Yardley London English Lavender Bar will redefine your bathing ritual. This classic English Lavender Botanical soap combines the natural bounty of Lavender and essential oils to create an aromatic and therapeutic bathing experience that is all about nourishment, hydration and revitalization.2 Bar Oatmeal & Almond with natural oatmeal to soothe dry skin Gently exfoliates Almond Naturally Moisturizing Bath Bar.Sweet overtones of almond mix with natural oatmeal to complete this extra gentle exfoliating bar. Soothe and defend against dry skin and irritation with tried and true ingredients that have made this our most popular soap. An affordable treat for everyday; cleanse, moisturize and feel the luxury. 2 Bar of Aloe & Avocado, 4.25 Ounces /120 GAloe & Avocado bar will perk up your mornings with its lively herbal and citrus scent, while it nourishes your skin.2 Bar of Pure Cocoa Shea Butter & Vitamin E, 4.25 Ounces /120 G Cocoa Butter Naturally Moisturizing Bath Bar. This enticing formula with softening shea & cocoa butter & vitamin E combines dry skin rescue with a rich, creamy scent, leaving skin luxuriously soft and beautifully replenished.2 Bar Lemon Verbena with natural shea butter and pure citrus oilssoftens and tones Yardley Lemon Verbena with Natural Shea Butter of London With natural shea butter & pure citrus oils Bar Soap helps soften and protect your skin Clean and Crisp.

productInformation.value: #6,566 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #91 in Bath Soaps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Yardley soaps are so well worth it! The way it lathers makes it so enjoyable to take a bath or showers. I'm glad they have the different scents it is one of the reasons I have been using this soap for over 30+ years. It doesn't dry out your skin. Most stores I have been to only carry one scent. I am Yardley customer for life. And I hope they continue to stay around. It is a wonderful brand much better than any other on the market!😇

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars not the same as what I bought before
reviews.reviewText: I think the soap I got may have been sitting in a warehouse for some time. It definitely did not smell as nice as the same product I have bought before. I will not buy from this seller again):

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this soap for the shower and hands. Smells wonderful!!! Soap is made very well. It ladders up nicely, each one smells wonderful and although it ladders up do well the bar lasts and lasts. I recommend it. Get the variety pack you won’t regret it. Great buy for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great, soft skin
reviews.reviewText: I buy this for my father every Christmas, it is the only soap he uses, and he absolutely loves it. The only problem, if you want to call it that, I had with shipping is that some of the bars got a little squished during shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars World of aromatic delight
reviews.reviewText: From the moment I unwrapped the first bar from the Yardley London Soap Bath Bar Bundle, I was instantly transported to a world of aromatic delight. This bundle, which boasts an assortment of ten bars, is nothing short of a sensory journey.The English Lavender bar is reminiscent of a serene walk through the English countryside, with fields of purple lavender swaying gently in the breeze. The scent is calming and therapeutic, making it perfect for a relaxing evening soak.Then there's the Oatmeal and Almond bar. It's a gentle embrace for the skin, combining the exfoliating properties of oatmeal with the nourishing touch of almond. This bar is a treat for those who seek both fragrance and functionality in their bath products.The Aloe and Avocado variant is a testament to rejuvenation. The soothing properties of aloe vera, combined with the richness of avocado, make this bar a balm for tired skin. After a long day, this soap feels like a refreshing splash of nature.The Cocoa Butter bar is pure indulgence. It's like enveloping oneself in a blanket of creamy, chocolaty goodness. Not only does it smell divine, but the moisturizing properties of cocoa butter also ensure that the skin feels soft and pampered long after the bath.Last but certainly not least, the Lemon Verbena bar is the epitome of freshness. The zesty lemon scent, combined with the subtle notes of verbena, is invigorating. It's the perfect pick-me-up for mornings when you need an extra boost.One of the standout features of these soaps is their longevity. Despite their rich lather, they don't melt away quickly, ensuring that you get the most out of each bar. The texture of the soaps is smooth, and they glide effortlessly on the skin, making the bathing experience truly luxurious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My fave soap
reviews.reviewText: A little pricey here compared to the supermarket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like to use these Yardleyof London English Lavender soaps as sachets and as gifts. Last time they arrived in perfect condition. This time they were horribly crushed and not gift quality. I would like a replacement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So the positives: Lasts forever, nice smell, cleans well, easy to store, easy to use. But, i didn't feel any different with this soap compared to some of the dollar store stuff. So for the price, the amount is nice, just wished it was having more impact on clearing up my skin.
Un parfum bien agréable, que l'on ne retrouve plus en eau de toilette. Le talc aussi est encore très parfumé
I overpaid from this seller,as I've just seen i can get 2 bars of the same soap for just under $4. I paid $15 for 3 bars here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality soap at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Nice variety of fragrances, which are not overpowering. Last well and good value.
